metadata.title: Navy-NOAA Joint Ice Center Sea Ice Data
metadata.description: To make available weekly sea ice charts prepared by Navy-NOAA Joint Ice Center and digitized in the WMO's SIGRID (sea ice grid) format.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To make available weekly sea ice charts prepared by Navy-NOAA Joint Ice Center and digitized in the WMO's SIGRID (sea ice grid) format.
